Trade/Device Name(s): ImmunoCAP Allergen d201, House dust mite
Analyte(s): IgE specific to Blomia tropicalis (house dust mite)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmunoCAP Allergen d201, a quantitative immunoassay for allergen-specific IgE to Blomia tropicalis (house dust mite) on ImmunoCAP platforms.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic quantitative measurement of allergen-specific IgE in serum or plasma to aid diagnosis of IgE-mediated allergic disorders, used with ImmunoCAP instruments in clinical or physician office laboratories.
